subtitle: This is how I stabilize data, streamline reporting, and keep systems reliable from discovery through handoff.

steps.title: Assess & Map
steps.description: Clarify goals, map workflows, and document system constraints early.

steps.title: Stabilize Data
steps.description: Clean, validate, and reconcile records for audit-ready accuracy.

steps.title: Automate & Report
steps.description: Build dashboards and repeatable reports that surface decisions faster.

steps.title: Enable Operations
steps.description: Deliver playbooks, training, and handoff support for reliable operations.
